entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0189.10184] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 with a value of 0.015 using the axis VariableRateAxis in the role 995935 - Disclosure - Senior Debt and Other Debt - Details of Long-term Debt (Details) on the table us-gaap:DebtInstrumentTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 was the member us-gaap:PrimeRateMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration or DebtInstrumentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:PrimeRateMember. The member us-gaap:PrimeRateMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 with a value of 0.015 without the VariableRateAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 fact are: Period :2024-01-01 to 2024-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:VariableRateAxis=us-gaap:PrimeRateMember, us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityAxis=rhe:CadenceBankNAMember, us-gaap:DebtInstrumentAxis=rhe:SeniorDebtUSDAMember, us-gaap:LongtermDebtTypeAxis=us-gaap:SeniorDebtObligationsMember, srt:RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationDescriptionOfPropertyAxis=rhe:SouthlandHealthcareMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:10184 Rule version: 26.0.9 - rhe-20240630.htm 4411

property.name: label
property.value: Debt Instrument Basis Spread On Variable Rate1

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0189.10184] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 with a value of 0.0175 using the axis VariableRateAxis in the role 995935 - Disclosure - Senior Debt and Other Debt - Details of Long-term Debt (Details) on the table us-gaap:DebtInstrumentTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 was the member us-gaap:PrimeRateMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration or DebtInstrumentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:PrimeRateMember. The member us-gaap:PrimeRateMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 with a value of 0.0175 without the VariableRateAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 fact are: Period :2024-01-01 to 2024-06-30 Dimensions : srt:RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationDescriptionOfPropertyAxis=rhe:MountainTraceRehabMember, us-gaap:LongtermDebtTypeAxis=us-gaap:SeniorDebtObligationsMember, us-gaap:VariableRateAxis=us-gaap:PrimeRateMember, us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityAxis=rhe:CommunityBankMember, us-gaap:DebtInstrumentAxis=rhe:SeniorDebtUSDAMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:10184 Rule version: 26.0.9 - rhe-20240630.htm 4390

entry.message:
[DQC.US.0189.10184] The filing has reported a value for the element us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 with a value of 0.0225 using the axis VariableRateAxis in the role 995935 - Disclosure - Senior Debt and Other Debt - Details of Long-term Debt (Details) on the table us-gaap:DebtInstrumentTable. However, the only member used to disaggregate the total for us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 was the member us-gaap:PrimeRateMember. If only one member is used on this axis then the filer should either:
1. Retag the filing using the element InvestmentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration or DebtInstrumentVariableInterestRateTypeExtensibleEnumeration with a value of us-gaap:PrimeRateMember. The member us-gaap:PrimeRateMember should be removed from the value as it represents the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.
2. Tag the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 with a value of 0.0225 without the VariableRateAxis axis. This rule will not generate an error if the aggregate value of us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 is reported.
The properties of this us-gaap:DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1 fact are: Period :2024-01-01 to 2024-06-30 Dimensions : us-gaap:LongtermDebtTypeAxis=us-gaap:SeniorDebtObligationsMember, srt:RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationDescriptionOfPropertyAxis=rhe:SouthlandHealthcareMember, us-gaap:VariableRateAxis=us-gaap:PrimeRateMember, us-gaap:LineOfCreditFacilityAxis=rhe:CadenceBankNAMember, us-gaap:DebtInstrumentAxis=rhe:SeniorDebtSBAMember Unit : pure
